alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central East Feliciana Parish, eastern Wilkinson and western Amite Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gloster, or 15 miles west of Liberty, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Gloster and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
